name: DevMaker
description:
DevMaker is a company specializing in the development of mobile applications for the iOS, Android and Windows Phone platforms. Created in 2011, and based in Curitiba, DevMaker quickly became a point of reference in technology and innovation, having developed until today more than 100 applications for companies of the most diverse sectors and sizes. With a team of highly qualified professionals, the company serves the whole of Brazil with modern solutions that transform customers' ideas into p
ractical, functional and intuitive applications.
